security_audit.summary: All 13 static findings are FALSE POSITIVES. The detected 'backticks' are Markdown inline code formatting syntax, not Ruby shell execution. The '.env' reference is documentation about configuration reuse, not sensitive data access. The 'weak cryptographic algorithm' and 'high entropy' findings do not apply to a documentation file. This skill only contains a SKILL.md file with no executable code.

content.value_statement: Content creators struggle to consistently produce engaging posts. This orchestrator connects hot topic discovery with AI content generation and viral scoring to automate the entire content pipeline from idea to publication-ready post.
actual_capabilities: Discovers trending topics from TopHub hotæ¦œå•
Generates drafts in Defou x Stanley style
Scores posts on 6 viral potential dimensions
limitations: Requires TopHub integration for hot topic data
Viral scoring is simulation-based, not real performance prediction
Output quality depends on upstream skill configurations
Language support limited to content generated by connected skills

use_cases.title: Automate daily content
use_cases.description: Set up automated pipeline for consistent social media posting without manual research and writing.

use_cases.title: Scale content production
use_cases.description: Process multiple trending topics into verified posts for client content calendars.

use_cases.title: Research-backed writing
use_cases.description: Automate hot topic discovery and initial drafting for newsletter content creation.

prompt_templates.title: Quick start
prompt_templates.prompt: Run the Master Orchestrator skill to create a viral-ready post from current hot topics.

prompt_templates.title: Batch processing
prompt_templates.prompt: Execute Master Orchestrator to generate 10 verified posts from today's trending topics.

prompt_templates.title: Topic filtering
prompt_templates.prompt: Run Master Orchestrator with custom topic filters to prioritize tech and AI content.

prompt_templates.title: Quality review
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me the viral scores for all generated posts and highlight the top performers.

output_examples.input: Run Master Orchestrator for today's hot topics
output: âœ“ Generated 10 drafts in Defou x Stanley style
âœ“ Viral scoring complete: 3 posts scored 8+/10

best_practices: Configure upstream skills before running the orchestrator for best results
Review viral scoring feedback to understand content improvement opportunities
Use the output directory as input for downstream publishing workflows
anti_patterns: Running without proper upstream skill configuration will produce low-quality output
Ignoring viral scoring feedback misses optimization opportunities
Expecting real-time viral performance prediction instead of scoring simulation

faq.question: What skills does Master Orchestrator connect?
faq.answer: It orchestrates tophub-defou-stanley-combo for content generation and viral-verification for quality scoring.

faq.question: Where are output files stored?
faq.answer: Final verified posts are saved to outputs/viral-verified-posts/ directory.

faq.question: Does it work with Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes, Master Orchestrator is compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code tools.

faq.question: How many topics does it process?
faq.answer: The skill automatically selects top 10 most viral-potential topics from the hotæ¦œå•.

faq.question: What viral dimensions are scored?
faq.answer: The quality engine scores posts across 6 dimensions simulating growth hacker criteria.

faq.question: Is additional configuration required?
faq.answer: The skill reuses the project's global .env configuration for environment settings.
